name: PolyPlanes
description:
VR (Oculust Quest) Singleplayer Arcade WW1 Aerial Warfare game, with rounds and high scores. You, together with a teammate bot, fight against a continuously increasing amount of enemies until your death.

This is the perfect game for competing with some friends at home, taking turns to try to reach your friend's scores.

All models in the game have been built in Gravity Sketch, I really recommend it for fast modelling in VR.
